Mila Kunis and husband Ashton Kutcher have set up a fund to support Ukrainian refugees, saying they will match donations of up to $3m (£2.25m).
Ukrainian-born actress Kunis, who left the country whe… [+2017 chars]

articles.author: Ellie Phillips
articles.title: Dr Alex George is accused of messaging other girls while dating his ex Amelia Bath - Daily Mail
articles.description: It comes after the A&E doctor turned reality star, 30, was last week reported to have been unfaithful to his last partner Ellie Hecht at least four times.
articles.content:
Love Island's Dr Alex George has been accused of messaging other girls while dating his ex Amelia Bath.
